sourcesContent:
/* src/App.js */ import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; // calendar imports // Docs: // http://intljusticemission.github.io/react-big-calendar/examples/index.html import BigCalendar from 'react-big-calendar' import moment from 'moment' // redux imports import { actions } from './actions/appAction'; import * as componentSelectors from './selectors/appSelector'; // images import theBandAmanda from './assets/theBandAmanda.jpg'; // assets import '../node_modules/react-big-calendar/lib/css/react-big-calendar.css'; // import 'https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.7.2/css/all.css' import './App.css'; const localizer = BigCalendar.momentLocalizer(moment); class App extends Component { populateNews = news => { // TODO TEDDY console.log("NEWS:"); console.dir(news); return
    {news.map(e =>
  • {e.news_title}

    {e.news_body}

    • )}
} pageView = () => { switch (this.props.currentFocus) { case "calendar": return
case "news": return
devlin et. al news
{this.populateNews(this.props.newsList.previous || [])}
case "theBand": return
the band

case "admin": return

this.props.inputAdminPassword(value)} placeholder="admin p-word?" onKeyPress={e => { if (e.key === 'Enter') { this.props.loginBandmember() } }}>

// switchViewTo("home") default: return (
this.props.switchViewTo("news")}>News
this.props.switchViewTo("calendar")} className="menuItem"> Calendar
this.props.switchViewTo("theBand")}>The Band
this.props.switchViewTo("videos")}>Videos
this.props.switchViewTo("photos")}>Photos
this.props.switchViewTo("albums")}>Albums
this.props.switchViewTo("subscribe")}>Subscribe
this.props.switchViewTo("contact")}>Contact
this.props.switchViewTo("tunes")}> Listen to those sweet sweet tunes
) } } displayHomeLink = () => this.props.currentFocus !== "home" ?
this.props.switchViewTo("home")}>Home
: null displayAdminButton = () => this.props.currentFocus !== "admin" ? this.props.switchViewTo("admin")}>Admin : null render = () => (

devlin et. al

{this.displayHomeLink()}
{this.pageView()}
{this.displayAdminButton()}
); } const { pageViewFocus, devlinEventsList, newsEntries, } = componentSelectors const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentFocus: pageViewFocus(state), eventsList: devlinEventsList(state), newsList: newsEntries(state), }); const { changePageView, adminUsername, adminPassword, bandmemberLogin, addEvent, stagedEventName, stagedEventStart, stagedEventEnd, addNews, addNewsTitle, addNewsBody, } = actions; const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ switchViewTo: target => dispatch(changePageView(target)), inputAdminUsername: value => dispatch(adminUsername(value)), inputAdminPassword: value => dispatch(adminPassword(value)), loginBandmember: () => dispatch(bandmemberLogin()), addNameToStagedEvent: value => dispatch(stagedEventName(value)), addStartTimeToStagedEvent: value => dispatch(stagedEventStart(value)), addEndTimeToStagedEvent: value => dispatch(stagedEventEnd(value)), addEvent: () => dispatch(addEvent()), addNews: () => dispatch(addNews()), addNewsTitle: value => dispatch(addNewsTitle(value)), addNewsBody: value => dispatch(addNewsBody(value)), }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(App);
